title: Bloodthirster passive says "Unique" for the lifesteal.
body:
Rioters talking about 2x BT's as a viable option.

I thought you decided against letting us stack them and kept it as a Unique...

?

replies.body:
Why would you even stack it? You don't get double the shield, so go get something else that has damage and life steal.

If they let you stack it to full advantage, you would see at least 4 BT on every AD.
